attributes.action: Only Allow Qualified Driving Instructors To Teach Learner Drivers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At the moment anyone who has passed their driving test, can teach a learner to drive a motor vehicle.
To improve the quality of driving in the U.K. only those who are Qualified should be allowed to instruct learner drivers.
This will also reduce the number of accidents caused by bad / poor driving.
